title: Truncated source file
body:
[src/Shared/ThreadingUtilities.cs](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/src/Shared/ThreadingUtilities.cs) has invalid (truncated) content.

Fun than it seems to be truncated at 2048 :smile_cat:

nodes.body: Lol :smile: Seems the file/class isn't used anywhere, so it can probably just be deleted.
We'll never know how the 2048 truncation happened ! :smile:
